de.esoco.gwt.server

Class ServiceContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.obrel.core.RelatedObject
      • de.esoco.gwt.server.ServiceContext
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.EventListener, javax.servlet.http.HttpSessionListener, javax.servlet.ServletContextListener, org.obrel.core.Relatable

    public abstract class ServiceContext
extends org.obrel.core.RelatedObject
implements javax.servlet.ServletContextListener, javax.servlet.http.HttpSessionListener
    A base class that provides a context for GWT web applications. It implements the ServletContextListener interface to initialize and shutdown global data structures and executes schedule processes if setup by subclasses. It also listens via HttpSessionListener for sessions and reports changes to an AuthenticatedServiceImpl instance if one has been registered with.

    To enable a service context the following code must be added to the application's web.xml file:

        <listener>
        <listener-class>
            [full name of the ServiceContext subclass]
        <listener-class>
    <listener>
